com.cas.utility

Class ReflectingImageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.cas.utility.AbstractCoverFlowImageAdapter
        • com.cas.utility.ReflectingImageAdapter

  • public class ReflectingImageAdapter
extends AbstractCoverFlowImageAdapter
    This adapter provides reflected images from linked adapter.
    Author:
    potiuk
